subject: Fw: Thank you for your recent refinance loan request, we are ready to lend you money regardless of Credit
body:
Your credit does not matter to us!
If you OWN real estate and want IMMEDIATE pocket money to spend ANY way you like, or simply require to LOWER your monthly payments by a third or more, here is best deal we can offer you NOW (hurry, this deal will expire THIS EVENING):
$423,000+ loan
AND EVEN MORE: After further review, our lenders have established the lowest current payments!
Hurry, when our deal is gone, it is gone. Simply fill in this user-friendly form... 
Don't worry about approval, your credit will not disqualify you!
http://getclvbdyshoes.com/
